description: MPEG-4 encoding profile created to serve broadcast services, permitting the highest quality, and supporting arbitrarily shaped objects using grayscale coding.

name: ISO/IEC 14496-2:2004. Information technology -- Coding of audio-visual objects -- Part 2: Visual. Main Profile (formal name);  MPEG-4, Visual Coding, Main Profile (common name)
